Options

Items

Mail

Migrate mail.

Calendar

Migrate calendar.

Contacts

Migrate contacts.

Tasks

Migrate tasks.

Rules

Migrate rules.

Additional Items

Sent

Migrate Sent folder.

Deleted Items

Migrate Deleted Items folder.

Junk

Migrate Junk Folder.

Additional Options

Migrate On or After

For any items being migrated, you can choose the date before which no messages will be migrated. This is useful for size management.

Maximum message size

Any messages larger than the given size (in Megabytes) will not be migrated.

Skip these folders

You can give a comma separated list of folders to skip. This is generally useful if users have a lot of local folders they are not interested in migrating.

Test Run

There is also the ability to do a Test run, where mailboxes are scanned, but no data is migrated. This is useful in determining any issues that may arise during subsequent migrations.
